summary: Frontend testing completed for Decision Box inline restructure and log order reversal. All 6 features tested and PASSED. Decision Box is now INSIDE Bot Logs panel (sticky at top), logs display newest at TOP, layout does NOT shift, and Decision Box completely disappears when no code.
passed_tests: Log order - newest logs appear at TOP (AWAITING_VERIFICATION at top, INPUT_STREAM below)
Decision Box is INSIDE Bot Logs panel (not floating modal)
Decision Box uses position: sticky with top: 0px
Decision Box parent is logs-container-wrapper (inline structure)
Decision Box completely disappears when no code (no placeholder)
Layout does NOT shift - Voice Bot Control panel stays at left: 800px
ACCEPT button works - removes Decision Box, plays final message
DENY button works - removes Decision Box temporarily, new code appears (445588 -> 123456)
critical_code_review_comments: Decision Box correctly restructured from floating modal to inline sticky element
Logs now use [...logs].reverse() to display newest at top
AnimatePresence with scale/opacity/y animation (300ms) provides smooth transitions
Decision Box only renders when showVerifyButtons && dtmfCode (no empty placeholder)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Decision Box restructure complete. Key changes: 1) Logs display in REVERSE order (newest at top) using [...logs].reverse() 2) Decision Box moved from floating modal (position: fixed) to INLINE sticky element (position: sticky, top: 0) inside logs-container-wrapper 3) Decision Box only renders when showVerifyButtons && dtmfCode - completely removed from DOM otherwise 4) ACCEPT/DENY buttons work correctly

mocked_apis.SignalWire voice API: Account suspended - calls use simulation mode
mocked_apis.Infobip calls API: Configuration blocked - calls use simulation mode

test_flow_summary.test_1_log_order: PASSED - First entry: AWAITING_VERIFICATION [21:49:22], Last entry: INPUT_STREAM [21:49:19]
test_flow_summary.test_4_no_placeholder: PASSED - Decision Box removed from DOM when no code, wrapperChildren: 1
test_flow_summary.test_5_layout_stability: PASSED - setupPanel.left unchanged at 800px before and after Decision Box
test_flow_summary.test_6_accept_deny_buttons: PASSED - ACCEPT removes box, DENY gets new code (445588 -> 123456)
